sqlMap.select: select to_char(numg_stare_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')as numg_stare_date from em_info em, numg n where em.em_numg_code = n.numg_code and numg_code = ( select em_numg_code from em_info where em_info_code = #em_info_code# )

select e.em_info_code,e.em_nm,to_char(n.numg_app_receipt_begin,'yyyy-mm-dd') numg_app_receipt_begin,to_char(n.numg_app_receipt_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') numg_app_receipt_end from numg n, em_info e where e.em_numg_code=n.numg_code

select place_code ,place_nm ,substr(substr(place_add,instr(place_add,' ',1)+1,instr(place_add,' ',-1)), 0 ,instr(substr(place_add,instr(place_add,' ',1)+1,instr(place_add,' ',-1)),' ',1)-1 ) as place_add ,place_location ,place_pp ,place_phone ,place_p from place where place_p=#place_p#

select p.place_code, p.place_nm , p.place_add, p.place_location,p.place_pp,p.place_phone,p.place_p,ep.em_stare_place_pp, (p.place_pp-ep.em_stare_place_pp)as place_ppp , to_char(n.numg_stare_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')as numg_stare_date,to_char(n.numg_app_receipt_end,'yyyy-mm-dd')as numg_app_receipt_end from em_info em , place p , numg n ,em_place ep where em.em_numg_code = n.numg_code and ep.em_info_code = em.em_info_code and ep.place_code = p.place_code and ep.em_info_code = #em_info_code# and p.place_p=#place_p#
substr(substr(p.place_add,instr(p.place_add,' ',1)+1,instr(p.place_add,' ',-1)), 0 ,instr(substr(p.place_add,instr(p.place_add,' ',1)+1,instr(p.place_add,' ',-1)),' ',1)-1 )=#place_add#
select to_char(numg_stare_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as numg_stare_date , em_nm, em_pay_pr, em_info_code from numg, em_info where em_numg_code = numg_code and em_info_code = #em_info_code#
